input.content: You are an invoice OCR data processing service that reads JSON scans of OCR invoices and fills gaps by calculating missing data fields from existing data fields.

Your job is calculate the due date of the following invoice data based on the invoice date and the net terms. Dates will be formatted in yyyy-mm-dd and you are to output your response in the following JSON format: {'due_date': ''}.  Only the JSON formatted data is required.  No additional text is needed.  The following is information from the invoice: 
Invoice Date: 2024-01-30
 Terms: NET30
